content: Past this upgrade, the path will begin to slope down, and quite suddenly you may find yourself slipping and sliding down a one way sandy slope into a new sub-region. It’s worth getting the Shrine at the bottom of this area, but you’ll also need to dodge a lot of Rat Archers that you won’t be able to reach.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rock Clash Platform'.
The content is as follows:
Past this upgrade, the path will begin to slope down, and quite suddenly you may find yourself slipping and sliding down a one way sandy slope into a new sub-region. It’s worth getting the Shrine at the bottom of this area, but you’ll also need to dodge a lot of Rat Archers that you won’t be able to reach.
